doc.title: 26 N. Halsted
doc.plot: 26 N. Halsted is a 30-minute issue responsive public affairs program designed to address, discuss and disseminate information relevant to Chicago and its communities. It is our goal to conduct thought-provoking discussions that directly and indirectly affect you and your neighborhoods. Our panel is made up of both prominent community members, who are recognized experts in the given issue being discussed, as well as the average "man on the street," who these issues affect. If you are looking for a program for, by and about Chicagoans ... 26 N. Halsted is your one stop shop for information.

26 N. Halsted is a 30-minute issue responsive public affairs program designed to address, discuss and disseminate information relevant to Chicago and its communities. It is our goal to conduct thought-provoking discussions that directly and indirectly affect you and your neighborhoods. Our panel is made up of both prominent community members, who are recognized experts in the given issue being discussed, as well as the average "man on the street," who these issues affect. If you are looking for a program for, by and about Chicagoans ... 26 N. Halsted is your one stop shop for information.
